about_the_game:
Set Contents

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Lucilius)

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (2B)

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Vane)

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Beatrix)

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Versusia)

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Vikala)

• 4 Color Variants (no. 5–8) for the 6 DLC characters

• 3 Weapon Skins (no. 2–4) for the 6 DLC characters

• Costume: Guider to the Eternal Edge (Gran)

• Costume: Guider to the Eternal Edge (Djeeta)

• Premium Avatar: Vikala (Yin)

- Some content in this set will be available as a stand-alone purchase. The additional characters included in this set will also be purchasable as GBVSR Character Pass 1. Please be careful to ensure you do not make a duplicate purchase.

- This set includes some content that can be obtained separately in the in-game Rupie Shop.
detailed_description:
Set Contents

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Lucilius)

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (2B)

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Vane)

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Beatrix)

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Versusia)

• GBVSR Additional Character Set (Vikala)

• 4 Color Variants (no. 5–8) for the 6 DLC characters

• 3 Weapon Skins (no. 2–4) for the 6 DLC characters

• Costume: Guider to the Eternal Edge (Gran)

• Costume: Guider to the Eternal Edge (Djeeta)

• Premium Avatar: Vikala (Yin)

- Some content in this set will be available as a stand-alone purchase. The additional characters included in this set will also be purchasable as GBVSR Character Pass 1. Please be careful to ensure you do not make a duplicate purchase.

- This set includes some content that can be obtained separately in the in-game Rupie Shop.
